entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical object that sorts students into houses at Hogwarts. It is described as 'shabby' and 'tattered', but still has a voice and can speak to Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story, who is hesitant to try on the Sorting Hat again. He wants to make sure it put him in the right house.

relationships.description: Harry Potter puts the Sorting Hat on his head, just like he did before. The Hat is too large and slips down over his eyes.
